Journal.Title: Journal of family medicine and primary care

Article.ArticleTitle: Smith-magenis syndrome: A rare case report.

Abstract.AbstractText: Smith-Magenis syndrome is a rare genetic disorder involving multiple body systems, along with mental retardation and sleep disturbances. It is attributed to micro deletion at 17p11.2 chromosome region encoding for RAI1 gene. This article presents a case report of a 7-year-old patient having this rare syndrome along with his genetic analysis.
